channel.title: [Delta] Server Connection Null
channel.description:
Hey so when ever I run my server and someone tries to connect I get this:
[code=java]Your server is now online. Connection from 127.0.0.1:64279 C o l d: character file not found. C o l d has logged out. Connection from 69.65.42.216:45608 null has logged out. Connection from 217.23.1.226:47444 null has logged out.[/code]
Help please?
Extra (I have my server port set to 43594 and my Ip set to the Ip in my no-ip duc) (one person has been able to connect, I still down know how he did since no one else can)

item.title: [Delta] Server Connection Null
item.dc:creator: @c_o_l_d c o l d
item.description:
@c_o_l_d wrote:

bamdude37:

well, the 217.23.1.226 ip would disconnect and be classified as null. It is the IP that connects to your server from google status page. It never actually logs in, it just checks to make sure your server is online.

Thanks, Id rep if I could…

But it still doesnt explain why people cant connect. I have legitimate IP addresses trying to log in.

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta] Server Connection Null
item.dc:creator: @bamdude37 bamdude37
item.description:
@bamdude37 wrote:

well, the 217.23.1.226 ip would disconnect and be classified as null. It is the IP that connects to your server from RuneLocus status page. It never actually logs in, it just checks to make sure your server is online.

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta] Server Connection Null
item.dc:creator: @c_o_l_d c o l d
item.description:
@c_o_l_d wrote:

well one person was able to connect, but I can see other people try aswell although they just null and disconnect.

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta] Server Connection Null
item.dc:creator: @P_A_N_I_C P A N I C
item.description:
@P_A_N_I_C wrote:

[quote=“c o l d, post:1, topic:396181”]Hey so when ever I run my server and someone tries to connect I get this:

Your server is now online. Connection from 127.0.0.1:64279 C o l d: character file not found. C o l d has logged out. Connection from 69.65.42.216:45608 null has logged out. Connection from 217.23.1.226:47444 null has logged out.

Help please?[/quote]
This happened to me once, I added antiSYI and everytime you connect to 127.0.0.1 it wont work. Try connecting to 0.0.0.0

If it doesn’t work PM me.

Read full topic
